paragraph.heading:
Spathoglottis plicata Blume, Bijdr. Fl. Ned. Ind.
: 401, 1825

subSubSection.paragraph:
Specimens examined:— MANDALAY . Unspecified: fide Saw Lwin (2004: 38) ; Myingyan District: 8 May 2005 , Khin Myo Htwe 4 (TNS [s]), fide
Tanaka et al. (2015: 86)
; same loc., 1 Jun 2006 , cult., Tanaka et al. 036160 (MBK), fide
Tanaka et al. (2015: 86)
. SHAN . Unspecified: fide Saw Lwin (2004: 38) .

Distribution:— Sri Lanka , India , the Himalayas, Myanmar , Thailand , Indochina, Taiwan , southern Japan and Malesia to New Guinea , northern Australia and the Pacific. Also naturalised elsewhere in the tropics.

Spathoglottis pubescens Lindl.
,
Gen . Sp. Orchid. Pl.
: 120, 1831. Types:—
MYANMAR . Bago Region : Pyay District ,
Wallich , Numer. List: no. 3744 A
( syntype : K-LINDL ; isosyntype: K-W )
;
MYANMAR . Mandalay Region : Kyaukse District ,
Wallich , Numer. List: no. 3744 B
( syntype : K-LINDL ; isosyntype: K-W )
;
BANGLADESH . Sylhet :
Bruce s.n.
in
Wallich , Numer. List: no. 3744 C
( syntype : K-LINDL ; isosyntype: K-W )

Homotypic synonym:
Spathoglottis plicata Blume var. pubescens (Lindl.) M.Hiroe, Orchid Flowers
2: 89, 1971.

Heterotypic synonym:
Spathoglottis bensonii Hook.
f.,
Fl. Brit. India
5: 814, 1890. Type:— MYANMAR . Bago Region : Pyay District , 1868, Benson s.n. (= Herb. Maingay 1640 ) ( holotype : K )
.
